item.description: hi - i’m josh, an independent security researcher based in New Zealand. i design, develop, and break software in the realm of information security. some of my published work can be found below: ransomwatch - the open ransomware claim tracker transl8 - a syntax translator and query generator for network search engines bebop - a framework for revealing infrastructure hiding through Tor and reverse proxies. multisocks - a scalable relay overlay for high-demand tor crawlers securitytools - a curated set of projects for security investigators kerchow - the swiss army-knife terminal extension set urlgen - a search engine overlay to expedite OSINT investigations honeypots - a handful of frontends to commonly abused services, ready to instrument statuspage - the underground statuspage bot tarpits: honey.
